```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(urbanplanet)
```

## Read streat tree inventory

```{r cars}
cityoi <- "AT"
df_tree <- read_tree_inventory(city = cityoi)
```

## Order PS data
```{r}
setting <- set_ps(api_key = "REMOVED")
order_ps_batch(dir = "alldata/PSdata/", df_plant = df_tree, v_site = cityoi, setting = setting)
```
